Text:
hi populus ... thanx for ur reply about peter and max being a prose novel.
ok i will discard that from my download list lol.

umm since u wanted to know about issue 18b.
here is a fables torrent i found. 
it has issue 18b which is named as - The Last Castle. 
This torrent also has jack of fables 1 to 50.

But for everyone the torrent gets stuck on 48%
:(
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7842310/Fables

Dude.  Look in the file list of the Fables torrent pack I linked you to last time.  You'll see this at the bottom in the Graphic Novels folder:
Graphic Novels/Fables - The Last Castle (2003) (Obi).cbr
If you look on wikipedia it isn't 18b.  It's just a prestige format one-shot.  I suppose whoever prepared that torrent named it that way for ordering purposes, but that isn't how it was released.  
In any event, it's in the torrent I linked you to before....
thanks for more great Novus scans, RubrumPopulus. theProletariat's stuff this week is particularly exceptional!

Yup , found it in the graphics novel folder.
Sorry for all the trouble.
Thanks again populus for the wonderful fables pack
Cheers.
np.  Hope you enjoy.  Fables is a lovely read.
